mapper.update: update business_card_relation set business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_num = #{cardNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where business_card_id = #{businessCardId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select business_card_id, business_id, card_id, card_num, create_time, update_time from business_card_relation
